items.sentence: I was in the garden all afternoon, pulling weeds.
I was tired and hungry, and so was everyone else.
I\'m sorry I didn\'t notice that you needed help.
I don\'t think Tom realizes how rude he\'s being.
We should be able to finish this in a day or two.
I\'m trying my best to forget that ever happened.
I\'ve already done everything you asked me to do.
I suspect that Tom doesn\'t speak French at work.
I didn\'t realize that you and Tom were so close.
Tom doesn\'t like spinach, so he didn\'t eat any.
